messages.title: ALL CHANGE AT WESTMINSTER
messages.content: We can't go on like this. The country needs a change of leadership, a change of direction.

messages.title: HEALTH COMES FIRST
messages.content: Sir George has campaigned for more services to be provided at Andover hospital, to reduce the need to travel to Winchester.

messages.title: A SQUARE DEAL FOR HAMPSHIRE
messages.content: Over the past twelve years, Hampshire has been starved of the funds it needs from central government.

messages.title: YOUR VOTE IS IMPORTANT
messages.content: We want to improve the quality of our public services by making them more responsive to those who use them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simplify and streamline the tax and benefit system, and create more jobs.
Improve the quality of public services and make them more responsive.
Need to reduce bureaucracy and central control, giving the freedom to trust their skills.
Ensure Hampshire receives a fair share of public funds.

issues.governance: We want to improve the quality of all our public services by making them more responsive to those who use them.
issues.health: Has campaigned for more services to be provided at Andover hospital.
issues.socialWelfare: We want to simplify and streamline the tax and benefit system, and create more jobs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sir George is a strong advocate of parliamentary reform, believing the House of Commons needs to be less about yah-boo politics and more about the thoughtful scrutiny of legislation – 'More bulldog, less poodle' as he told his Party Conference.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has combined a successful Ministerial career in Parliament, serving under Margaret Thatcher and then joining John Major’s cabinet, with being highly active in his constituency.

politicalExperience.role: Chairman of the Backbench Services Committee, Shadow Secretary of State for the Environment and, as Shadow Leader of the House
politicalExperience.achievements: Active roles within the House of Commons.

images.caption: Sir George with Macmillan Cancer Support advocates
Sir George addressing issues of local sports funding
Images illustrating George Young interacting with constituents and working on various local matters

leaflet.additionalNotes: As a former Housing Minister, George has been very active in trying to resolve the credit crunch mortgage problems that have prevented young couples from buying their first home.
